recipesJson.name: Rappleberry
recipesJson.author: kindground
recipesJson.description:
I found this throwaway/spitball recipe on the reddit sub by NotCharlesmanson. https://www.reddit.com/r/DIY_eJuice/comments/3txve1/flavor_of_the_week_dragon_fruit/cxa78ss

It's a very refreshing, juicy, bright raspberry that's perfect for summer. I'm tinkering with the profile a bit.
